page.title: 14Credits
page.content: The survey of this area was done by the headmaster and junior pupils of {Broadhempston Primary School.}As this is a small village school all twelve juniors were involved although none live in the survey area.This meant a lot of travelling and we thank parents who helped with transport and the many inhabitants who made us welcome, showed us around, answered questions and even provided refreshment! The school is not in the survey area so the two pages about Broadhempston were done by us instead of Ipplepen School in whose area it comes.{List of {Credits }Children-James Manser,Philip Pascoe,Daniel Stevens,Matthew Salt,Dominic Reardon,Sarah Pittard, Clay Builder,Thomas Stevens,Tom Duffy, Chris Pascoe,Chris Harvey,Nicola Cheakley. Headmaster-Alan Baker.
